item.description:
New Haven meets East Haven somewhere over I-95. Come join us at the newly remodeled, OUTSIDE PATIO at Fireside.

Specials are:
Free appetizers
$3 domestic beers, $4 imports
$5 mixed drinks

Please RSVP so we can get a real count for the manager.

Easy directions from New Haven: Exit 50 off I-95 North from New Haven and points North/West (or Exit 51 from I-95 South, from East Haven and points East).

Fireside is located on Woodward Ave, across the street from Citizens Bank and Forbes Gas Station, at Rt 1 and Woodward Ave. From Exit 50, take a LEFT onto Woodward, go straight through the next intersection, and Fireside is on your LEFT. From Exit 51, stay in the right lane, and take a RIGHT onto Woodward Ave, at Citizens Bank. Fireside is on your Left.

the directions on Google and Superpages indicate the restaurant is near Fort Hale Park, but this is INCORRECT!
item.name: Happy Hour at Fireside on Their Outdoor Patio!
